rows.translation: What is it that they are questioning each other about?!

bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

rows.translation: [Is it] about the Great Tiding,
the one about which they differ?
No indeed! Soon they will know!
No indeed! Soon they will know for once again!
Did We not make the earth a resting place?
and the mountains stakes?
and create you in pairs?
and make your sleep for rest?
and make the night a covering?
and make the day for livelihood?
and build above you the seven mighty heavens?
and make [the sun for] a radiant lamp?
and send down water pouring from the rain-clouds,
that We may bring forth with it grains and plants,
and luxuriant gardens?
Indeed the Day of Judgement is the tryst,

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
rows.translation: the day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will come in groups,
rows.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fiṣ ṣūri fata-tūna afwājā

rows.translation: and the sky will be opened and become gates,
and the mountains will be set moving and become a mirage.
Indeed hell is in ambush,
a resort for the rebels,
to reside therein for ages,

rows.arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
rows.translation: tasting in it neither any coolness nor drink,
rows.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharābā

rows.translation: except boiling water and pus,
a fitting requital.
Indeed they did not expect any reckoning,
and they denied Our signs mendaciously,
and We have figured everything in a Book.
So [now] taste! We shall increase you in nothing but punishment!
Indeed a triumph awaits the Godwary:
gardens and vineyards,
and buxom maidens of a like age,
and brimming cups.

rows.arabic: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا
rows.translation: Therein they shall hear neither vain talk nor lies
rows.transliteration: lā yasma`ūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhhābā

rows.translation: —a reward and a sufficing bounty from your Lord,

rows.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
rows.translation: the All-beneficent, the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them. They will not be able to address Him
rows.transliteration: rabbis samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumar raḥmān ۖ lā yamlikūna minhu khiṭābā

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
rows.translation: on the day when the Spirit and the angels stand in an array: none shall speak except someone who is permitted by the All-beneficent and says what is rightful.
rows.transliteration: yawma yaqūmur rūḥu wal malā-ikatu ṣaffā ۖ lā yatakallamūna illā man adhina lahur raḥmānu waqāla ṣawābā

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
rows.translation: That day is true for certain. So let anyone who wishes take resort with his Lord.
rows.transliteration: dhālikal yawmul ḥaqq ۖ faman shā-at-takhadha ilā rabbihi ma-ābā

rows.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
rows.translation: Indeed We have warned you of a punishment near at hand—the day when a person will observe what his hands have sent ahead and the faithless one will say, ‘I wish I were dust!’
rows.transliteration: innā andharnākum `adhāban qarīban yawma yanẓurul mar-u mā qaddamat yadāhu wayaqūlul kāfiru yālaytanī kuntu turābā
